Philippines conducts marine patrols to check presence of Chinese research shipsThe Philippines on Monday deployed a coastguard vessel to carry out a two-week patrol mission in waters north and east of the country to intensify its maritime presence and check on Chinese research vessels that were spotted in Benham Rise. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 02:05:22 GMT YFYI6YZOFZJ73DYGRK6POJERAM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-conducts-marine-patrols-check-presence-chinese-research-ships-2024-03-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
South Korea, US troops kick off annual drills over North threatsSouth Korean and U.S. militaries kicked off their spring drills on Monday with twice the number of troops joining compared to last year, officials said, as the allies seek to better counter North Korea's increasing nuclear and missile threats. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 02:01:35 GMT TK6QCOO4IFOJFBXU75AJJTU3DE https://www.reuters.com/world/south-korea-us-troops-kick-off-annual-drills-over-north-threats-2024-03-04/Hyonhee Shin世界
Dollar eases as Fed clues awaited; bitcoin hits 2-year highThe U.S. dollar drifted weaker on Monday, pressured by lower Treasury yields, as traders waited for more crucial economic data for fresh clues on the timing of Federal Reserve interest rate cuts. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 01:49:38 GMT S5IAJCYBEVL23MG3U42WCU5FDA https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-eases-fed-clues-awaited-bitcoin-hits-2-year-high-2024-03-04/Kevin Buckland市场货币
Nikkei leads Asia higher into event-packed weekAsian share markets firmed on Monday as the Nikkei reached another new high and investors braced for a week packed with central bank events and major data that will refine market wagers for when interest rates will start falling. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 00:22:19 GMT RUEWKAYRWROLHF4NSI4DKDFNXI https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-03-04/Wayne Cole市场
Australia welcomes Southeast Asia leaders with fresh maritime security fundingAustralia said on Monday Indo-Pacific and Southeast Asian countries are facing serious defence threats as it set aside more funds for a maritime security pact with ASEAN countries during a summit with the Southeast Asian bloc. US funding bill blocks China from buying oil from Strategic Petroleum ReserveA measure in the U.S. funding legislation unveiled by congressional leaders on Sunday would block China from buying oil from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.
